M1_MP.description: (SMT ONLY) Metal 1 (PC Layer) Metal Pitch: CPP/2

M2_MP.description: (SMT ONLY) Metal 2 (M0 Layer) Metal Pitch: Default to M4. Not part of GR.

M4_MP.description: (SMT ONLY) Metal 4 (M2 Layer) Metal Pitch: Not part of GR.

M1_MetalPitch.description: (Layout ONLY) Metal 1 (PC Layer) Metal Pitch: CPP/2

Local_Parameter.description: 0: Disable(Default) 1: Localization for Internal node within same diffusion region

PE_Parameter.description: 1: Pin Enhancement Function 2: Edge-based Pin Separation 3: Minimize PS=1 and PS=2

PE1_newflag.description: 0: use virtual-edge based implementation (old), 1: use edge-based implementation (new) for performance (AND3x2, OR3x2, AOI22x1)

VR_stacked_via_flag.description: 1: Allow stacked via 0: Not allow stacked via

VR_double_samenet_flag.description: 1: Allow double via for same net; 0: Not allow double via for same net

dummy_g_struct_flag.description: Identify Dummy structure as Split or Share

dummy_sd_struct_flag.description: Identify Dummy structure as Split or Share

stack_struct_flag.description: Identify PFET on NFET [PN] or NFET on PFET [NP] ; ICCAD=PN

via_cost.description: Cost for VIA construction (related to MP-based Metal Cost)

top_metal_cost_multiplier.description: Cost Mutiplier for Top Layer Metals (related to MP-based Metal Cost)
